title: Why DeFi is the biggest thing in the history of finance - Economic Times
content: Why DeFi is the biggest thing in the history of finance  Economic Times
description: According to DeFi Pulse, the total value locked in DeFi protocols is over $78 billion â€” a growth of 10x since May 2020. This represents the current value of all deposits locked in the form of cryptocurrencies for lending, staking, liquidity pool and so on.
